name.minLength: Name must be at least {{minLength}} characters long
name.maxLength: Name must be at most {{maxLength}} characters long

email.email: Email must be a valid email

new-password.required: Password must be at least 8 characters long, contain an uppercase letter, a number, and a special character.
new-password.equal: New password and confirm password must match.
new-password.same: Your current password cannot be the same as your new password.

new-pin.equal: New PIN and confirm PIN must match.
new-pin.same: Your current PIN cannot be the same as your new PIN.

products.sku-preprocess: Product No. must minimum be 1 character
products.product-group-preprocess: Product group must minimum be 1 character
products.product-text-preprocess: Product text must minimum be 1 character
products.cost-price-type: Cost price must be a number
products.cost-price-not-negative: Cost price cannot be negative and must be a number.
products.sales-price-type: Sales price must be a number
products.barred-values: Unknown value in barred. Use true, false, ja or nej
products.order-amount-type: Order amount must be a number

placement.name-minLength: Name must be at least {{minLength}} characters long

organisation.email-valid: Email must be a valid email
organisation.minimum-location: At least one location must be picked
organisation.couldnt-find-customer-information: Couldn't find the customer's information. Try to close and re-open the pop-up window.
organisation.location-name-minLength: Location name must be at least {{minLength}} characters long
organisation.location-name-maxLength: Location name must be at most {{maxLength}} characters long
organisation.couldnt-find-location-information: Couldn't find the location's information. Try to close and re-open the pop-up window.
organisation.minimum-user: At least one user must be picked
organisation.company-name-minLength: Company name must be at least {{minLength}} characters long
organisation.company-name-maxLength: Company name must be at most {{maxLength}} characters long

register.name-minLength: Name must be at least {{minLength}} characters long
register.name-maxLength: Name can be at most {{maxLength}} characters long
register.email: Email must be a valid email address
register.password: Password must be at least 8 characters.
register.confirm-password: Password and confirm password must match

create-customer.name-minLength: Name must be at least {{minLength}} characters long
create-customer.name-maxLength: Name can be at most {{maxLength}} characters long
create-customer.email: Email must be a valid email address

log-in.email: Email must be a valid email address
log-in.password: Password must be at least 8 characters.

sign-up-invited.password: Password must be at least 8 characters.
